summary.para: Creates a 3D lookup table for mapping a 3-channel input to a 3-channel output. The table data must be provided in 4-channel format.

param.name: precision
param.para: Precision of the input lookup table data.

param.name: extents
param.para: Number of lookup table elements per dimension (X, Y, Z).

param.name: data
param.para: Buffer holding the lookup table data.

param.name: dataCount
param.para: Size of the lookup table data buffer.

param.name: strides
param.para: An array containing two values. The first value is the size in bytes from one row (X dimension) of LUT data to the next. The second value is the size in bytes from one LUT data plane (X and Y dimensions) to the next.

param.name: lookupTable
param.para: Receives the new lookup table instance.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides factory methods and other state management for effect and transform authors.
